il.ac.hit.samples.couponix.db

Class Category

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.hit.samples.couponix.db.Category

  • @Entity
public class Category
extends java.lang.Object
    the Class Category describe the table Category in DataBase that hibernate make this Class Like Object , the hiberante mapping the class to object in dataBase, all variable describe a line in table, Each variable is a column in the table describes a feature or detail Category for each Category it possible to save number of coupon(One to Many)
    Author:
    Inna Ladaev&Tzahi Weizman

        Parameters:
        categoryId - describe Category Id it is a primary key in this table
        categoryName - describe Category name in a Category table ,Updating the table column categoryName
        imgCategory - describe Category image by URL of Category image,Updating the table column imgCategory
